name: Easy-Chroma for Stream Capture
description:
Really short edit to pandora.com to allow an easy Blue-chroma capture

Thicker text and blue (#0000FF) background for easy chroma
You can edit to #00FF00 for green chroma but it's too flash for my eyes on second screen personally.

Enjoy, love,
-Sardoche
additional_info:
Working 16 April 2018.

Pandora may update his website/class, it happens frequently (1-2 times a year), yet I should update it !
